product_name: Outside Inside Ladder Ball Dome Game
long_description: Keep active fun close at hand in your campsite or backyard with the Ladder Ball Dome Game from Outside Inside. Easily sets up like a tent with included fiberglass poles: 2 long shock-corded poles, 3 short poles, 4 pegs. One side is Ladder Ball, which features 3 "rungs" over which players try to hook their bolos tossed from a distance (6 bolos included: 3 blue, 3 yellow). The other side is Corn Hole, which features 3 holes of varied sizes and difficulty into which players try to toss "bean bags" (6 pouches included: 3 blue, 3 yellow). Pouches open so you can stuff the bolos inside to create your "bean bags". Games on the Ladder Ball Dome from Outside Inside can be played by 2 to 4 players.
short_description: Keep active fun close at hand in your campsite or backyard with the Ladder Ball Dome Game from Outside Inside.
